:END:

:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: section-3
:END:
- perf: enable strict mode

* 0.5.0 / 2014-10-11

- Add =parse= function

* 0.4.0 / 2014-09-21
:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: section-5
:END:

- Add =type= option

* 0.2.0 / 2014-09-19
:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: section-7

:CUSTOM_ID: section-9

- Fix invalid characters appearing in =filename*= parameter
